summary: MY DAUGHTER WAS DRIVING MY 1998 PONTIAC  SUNFIRE AND HAD A COLLISION WITH ANOTHER CAR.  SHE REPORTED THAT THE BRAKES FAILED AND WOULD NOT STOP THE CAR AT ALL.  WE HAVE ALSO REPORTED TO THE DEALER ON MULTIPLE OCCASIONS THAT THE GAS PEDAL GETS  STUCK. THIS MAY HAVE ALSO CONTRIBUTED TO THE COLLISION.   *NLM
